title: Login not working
description: User unable to log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment failure
description: Customer's payment was declined but balance was deducted.

title: App crash on startup
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after launching.

title: Slow dashboard loading
description: Dashboard takes more than 30 seconds to load.

title: Email notifications not received
description: User is not receiving any email alerts from the system.

title: Profile picture not uploading
description: Customer cannot upload profile picture in settings.

title: Password reset link expired
description: Customer reports the reset password link expires too soon.

title: Order not showing in history
description: Recent order is missing from customer's order history.

title: Search not returning results
description: Search feature is not showing relevant results.

title: Double billing issue
description: Customer charged twice for the same service.

title: Live chat not connecting
description: Customer cannot connect to live chat support.

title: App update not installing
description: Latest update fails to install on Android devices.

title: Invoice download error
description: User unable to download invoices in PDF format.

title: Language preference not saving
description: System reverts to English despite setting another language.

title: Cart items disappearing
description: Products added to cart disappear after a few minutes.
